availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Stephens (Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Ann Willis Stephens. Father of James W. Stephens, John C. Stephens, Joel A. Stephens, Sarah Catherine Stephens, Mary E. Stephens, George C. Stephens, Alice Stephens, Ann Stephens, Narcissa Stephens, Letitia Stephens, and Peter Stephens. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1860. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2, p. 73B.
